level.heading: Agreements required.
level.text: The Mayor shall enter into an agreement with the United States Civil Service Commission to carry out the purposes of subchapters XXI, XXII, and XXVI of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-139
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 1-601.01.
